SA15dhksparu:1: A number of five figures at the left side indicates the location of the key word
SA15dhksparu:2: in the basic texts. In the case of the SV, the HB and the VN, the first three figures
SA15dhksparu:3: indicate the page number, and the last two indicate the line number (for example,
SA15dhksparu:4: SV16026=SV 160,26; HB02314=HB 23,14; VN06110=VN 61,10). In the case of the
SA15dhksparu:5: PV and the NB, the second figure indicates the chapter number and the last three
SA15dhksparu:6: figures indicate the karika or sutra number (for example, PV02232=PV, the
SA15dhksparu:7: Pramanasiddhi-chapter v.232; NB03015=NB, the Pararthanumana-chapter sutra 15.
SA15dhksparu:8: In the case of the SP, the last two figures indicate the karika number (for example,
SA15dhksparu:10: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units, although they
SA15dhksparu:11: involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words are
SA15dhksparu:12: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
SA15dhksparu:13: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
SA15dhksparu:15: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to
SA15dhksparu:17: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes
SA15dhksparu:18: making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided, and terms
SA15dhksparu:19: such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
SA15dhksparu:20: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta fundamentally
SA15dhksparu:22: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the
SA15dhksparu:23: wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya, tadutpatti,
SA15dhksparu:24: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
SA15dhksparu:25: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
SA15dhksparu:26: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
SA15dhksparu:29: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example, -d
SA15dhksparu:30: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of
SA15dhksparu:31: using this database to make an KWIC index.
SA15dhksparu:35: This database is quite a tentative one, and I must admit that there are a lot of
SA15dhksparu:36: errors and defects in this version. I would appreciate it very much if the user would
SA15dhksparu:37: point out any errors in this version so that we can make a better new version in the
SA15dhksparu:41: pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
SA15dhksparu:42: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:43: rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhksparu:44: tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:45: para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:46: saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:48: kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
SA15dhksparu:49: tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
SA15dhksparu:50: ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
SA15dhksparu:54: prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
SA15dhksparu:56: tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
SA15dhksparu:57: yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
SA15dhksparu:58: upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan
SA15dhksparu:61: dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
SA15dhksparu:63: yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
SA15dhksparu:64: bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
SA15dhksparu:66: apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
SA15dhksparu:71: bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā
SA15dhksparu:74: vikalpā darśayanty arthān mithyā-arthā ghaṭitān iva
SA15dhksparu:75: bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
SA15dhksparu:76: bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
SA15dhksparu:78: anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhksparu:79: janane api hi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinā
SA15dhksparu:80: samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
SA15dhksparu:81: tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
SA15dhksparu:82: sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
SA15dhksparu:83: saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
SA15dhksparu:85: saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
SA15dhksparu:89: teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
